DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety third vaccination FSME-IMMUN NEW volunteer receive vaccination Baxter study 208 ( safety study FSME IMMUN NEW ENCEPUR healthy volunteer age 16 65 year ) .
DOC.brief_title: FSME IMMUN NEW Follow-up Study 208 Volunteers Aged 16 66 Years
DOC.criteria: Received two vaccination course Baxter study 208 Understand nature study , agree provision give write informed consent For volunteer 18 year age write informed consent parents/legal guardian give Volunteers assess eligibility receive third vaccination . Eligibility receive third vaccination : ELISA value > 126 VIE U/ml first TBE vaccination Baxter study 208 Not clinically healthy , ( i.e . physician would reservations vaccinate FSMEIMMUN NEW outside scope clinical trial ) Have already administer third TBE vaccination elsewhere since receive two vaccination Baxter study 208 Have allergic reaction one component vaccine since last vaccination Baxter study 208 Suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid , chemotherapeutics ) expect influence immunological function Have know suspect problem drug alcohol abuse ( > 4 liter wine / week equivalent dose alcoholic beverage ) Have receive banked human blood immunoglobulin within one month study entry Are know become infected HIV ( special HIV test require purpose study ) since last visit study 208 Have vaccination yellow fever / Japanese Bencephalitis since last visit study 208 Have receive investigational new drug within 6 week prior study start Have positive pregnancy test first medical examination ( female capable bear child ) Do agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study ( female capable bear child )
